post.body: are you still in LBI?
wishes those who are still in Australia a Happy New 2009...and yes, there are still a few left...all of the rest are here....lol
is looking for a way to get up to Morristown tomorrow morning so that he can do stuff with resident Aussies...any suggestions...
is going to have a really great New Years Eve! He strongly believes in it!
is hoping to make it out to Jersey Gardens later on today, but if not...will find something else to do...
received his confirmation and is enjoying his night of sitcoms and such on TV...hoping tomorrow goes as he would like it or w/e happens!
is patiently and prayerfully awaiting confirmation that certain Aussies got here safely so that plans can be made...
is getting better at Rock Band, finally has NYE plans (thanks to DC), and is now awaiting for Karen, Kellie, Brian, and Tiana....
seems to be getting pretty good at Rock Band, still has no plans for New Years Eve, and is praying for Karen and Kellie's continued travels
is very tired....and looked at his cell phone...and realized he slept in...and missed training today....hate it when i sleep in....ugh
is pretty much open to anything this week and has intentions of having friends over most of the week...tomorrow NB Setup for training...
is watching Get Smart with the fam and praying that Kellie and Karen have a super safe trip here!
is the proud new owner of Rock Band! He really loves the drums and vocals (when he knows the song)...yey!
is home and is watching a marathon of his favorite show entitled House...ahhh the sarcasm and psychological experiment that is...
will be heading back to his appartment later on today after he has some pancakes, packs his stuff, and then takes the long trek home...yey!
is super happy to hear that the Kangs now have three beautiful daughters...continued prayers for them
is about to watch the Rangers win today's game...I'm sorry...it's hard to be a fan of anything else when your dad and brother worship hockey
seems to have a pattern of utter happiness when he's with his father and his grandma...playing card games and eating good food...yey me!
wishes that some of his dad's cooking skillz would rub off on him...he could use them to make really great stuff!
is a happy person...just had Pizza Hut pizza...and is watching the psychological experiment that is The Dark Knight with dad and Chris
